content: an easy to follow lace pattern with all over leaves it can be knitted until desired size finishing off after a full repeat of the chart the scarf could easily be knit in a heavier weight yarn using the right size needle to give you a fabric you like and using fewer repeats across the pattern is charted and has written instructions too errata there is a missing k2tog on row 13 15 17 19 21 23 after the repeat section also the written directions forgot to mention the repeat on 7 9 and 11 even though the chart was correct i have updated the pdf and have included the date of march 29 2010 on the last page if your does not have this date please print out another copy sorry for any inconvenience
